text: The 1999 Pan American Women's Handball Championship was the fifth edition of the Pan American Women's Handball Championship, held in Buenos Aires, Argentina from 30 March to 3 April 1999. It acted as the American qualifying tournament for the 1999 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Standings== ==Results== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1999 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1999 Women American Women's Handball Championship American Women's Handball Championship H Category:Sport in Buenos Aires Category:March 1999 sports events Category:April 1999 sports events in South America
title: 1999 Pan American Women's Handball Championship
